mapper.select: SELECT * FROM image_file i INNER JOIN accommodation a ON i.image_file_no = a.image_file_no WHERE a.accommodation_no=#{accommodationNo}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO reverseauction_tender VALUES(0, #{memberId}, #{companyNo}, #{companyName}, #{accommodationNo}, #{accommodationName}, #{guestroomNo}, #{guestroomName}, #{reverseauctionNo}, #{accommodationGuestroomAllcount}, #{guestroomStateCount}, now(), null, #{reverseauctionTenderContent}, #{reverseauctionTenderPrice}, 1, "낙찰대기중")
mapper.update: UPDATE reverseauction_tender SET accommodation_no=#{accommodationNo}, accommodation_name=#{accommodationName}, guestroom_no=#{guestroomNo}, guestroom_name=#{guestroomName}, reverseauction_tender_update_date=now(), reverseauction_tender_content=#{reverseauctionTenderContent}, reverseauction_tender_price=#{reverseauctionTenderPrice} WHERE reverseauction_tender_no=#{reverseauctionTenderNo}
UPDATE reverseauction_register SET reverseauction_tender_count = reverseauction_tender_count + 1 WHERE reverseauction_no=#{reverseauctionNo}
